ai-patthana13.20:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.20:1.1_0: Not consciousness arises dependent on a teaching and training. Since there is no cause or condition for the sake of these two.
ai-patthana13.20:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of external things,
ai-patthana13.20:3.1_0: You have clarify the reason for two, namely, clans, and uncomfortables.
